  • Method Details

    • move

      public static String[][] move(String[][] maze, Player[] players, Scanner scanner, short index)
      Moves the player to a new position based on input. Ensures the movement is valid and updates the maze.
      Parameters:
      maze - a 2D array representing the maze
      players - the array of Player objects
      scanner - the Scanner object to read user input
      index - the index of the current player
      Returns:
      the updated maze with the player's new position

    • place_bombs

      public static String[][] place_bombs(String[][] maze, Scanner scanner)
      Allows the player to place a bomb in the maze. Ensures the position is valid and updates the maze.
      Parameters:
      maze - a 2D array representing the maze
      scanner - the Scanner object to read user input
      Returns:
      the updated maze with the bomb position marked

    • isBlocked

      public static void isBlocked(String[][] maze, Player player, int index)
      Checks if a player is blocked in all four directions. Marks the player as defeated if they are blocked.
      Parameters:
      maze - a 2D array representing the maze
      player - the Player object to check
      index - the index of the player being checked

    • isVictory

      public static void isVictory()
      Determines if the game has ended. Declares a winner or a draw based on the remaining players. Add the right points corresponding to the winner and looser
